remarks: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 8-Jun-2011.)
statement:
cbvral.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbvral.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbvral.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvrex $p |- ( E. x e. A ph <-> E. y e. A ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
